location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No.123/880 of 1875 from Colonel Sir Lewis Pelly, Agent Governor General and Special Commissioner administering the Baroda state, Baroda to Charles Umpherston Aitchison, The Foreign Secretary to the Government of India, Simla

mods.abstract: Letter regarding forwarding for the Governments information letter No.112/879 (this should read 122/879) addressed to the Government of Bombay in which he thanks them and the various military officers stationed at Baroda for their support in all military matters.
